titles.title: Expressing support for the designation of February 8, 2010, as "Boy Scouts of America Day", in celebration of the Nation's largest youth scouting organization's 100th anniversary.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

term.name: Social work, volunteer service, charitable organizations

bill.summary: 2/4/2009--Introduced. Expresses support for the designation of Boy Scouts of America Day in celebration of its 100th anniversary.
